description:
The beautiful Kirra starts off with an agenda, to learn to love being dominated. She has never been tied before & is usually in charge. We have other plans for her. Put into her first bondage, Kirra quickly learns that all things change when place into our hands. She submits, to our rope, clips, canes and hooks, and comes out loving it!
We also give you a special treat this week with a guest appearance from the sexy Amber Rayne. Amber is brought in to show Kirra what might be expected of her in bondage at a later date, if she is good that is.
title: Defiant Kirra learns to love being dominated
